lines.text: ["Big" Dick is points his pistol at Madame Desiree]
That doesn't scare me. I've seen bigger ones in my time.
That doesn't surprise me.
All this talk of Big Dick. I've had enough of it!
Ah, I see. Well, I'd like to use my organ again.
I beg your pardon?
The bellows are leaking and they do cost so much to repair them.

[while doing a sermon Flasher says that anyone who has not visited a prostitute may leave the church. Bodkin gets up and starts to leave]
Ah... Brother Bodkin. I see you haven't sinned
No Reverend... I just remembered where I left my hat last night!
Ha ha ha ha!
William, don't you think it's time you came to church again?
What do you mean, Rector? Don't you remember? I was there last Sunday. I took the collection.
I know. Next Sunday I want you to bring it back.
If there is one man, just one man amongst you who can say in all truthfulness that within the past week he has not committed adultery then he may leave this church now and go with my blessing.
[Bodkin stands up and starts to leave]
Ah, we have at least one good man with us. Well done, brother Bodkin.
Oh it's not that, Rector. You just reminded me where I left my hat last night.
[Madame Desiree passes him on the stairs carrying a sword]
I wouldn't fancy a poke with that.
What did you say?
Your blade, ma'am.
I shouldn't worry
[pointing the blade at his crotch]
You don't look as if you've got much to lose.
it's a Bloody Yew"
